AEROMARINE AERIAL SCENIC TOURS
Aerial flights over Florida's most beautiful scenery-quickest, safest, most delightful means of viewing
this and hundreds of other interesting sights from the air.
SPECIAL CHARTERS, hourly or weekly, by appointment.
These charters for pleasure parties may be made on an hour's notice.
Flying boats are available for charter
flights to any part of Florida, Bahamas or West Indies in case of emergency, such as missing train or steamer
connections, etc.
AEROMARINE FLYING BOATS OPERATING BETWEEN THE UNITED STATES, CUBA AND
WEST INDIES ARE EQUIPPED WITH RADIO—YOUR LIFE INSURANCE POLICY
IS NOT AFFECTED BY TRAVELING IN AN AEROMARINE.
"BE SURE IT'S AN AEROMARINE AND YOU WILL ALWAYS BE SAFE"
